website_summaries.verdict: A large, heavy-duty replacement tire (and rim) manufactured to fit popular wheelbarrow brands.
pros: This no-flat tire is made of durable polyurethane foam
It comes permanently attached to a rim, making replacement an easy task
The tire can support a 500-pound load and includes a limited lifetime warranty
cons: Not a con, but remember that this is a larger wheel with a 16-inch diameter and 6-inch hub
Make sure your wheelbarrow can accommodate the size

customer_reviews.title: very well made
customer_reviews.text: i had bought some other tires for my yard cart and they were worthless, but these work great , they can actually handle some weight , a couple hundred pds so far. also they have a very wide axle shaft , which i used a 4' cutting wheel to down size to fit my cart , after i tapped the bearings out.then i just tapped the bearings back in after i evenly cut the shaft down, and they now fit perfect with no shims. highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: habbitt

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: My old wheel barrow tires had given out. It was too early in the season for stores to have many options available. At the end I ended up just buying an $80 Craftsman from Lowe’s. 3 weeks later one of those tire blew. Hmm... I then spent $80 on replacement wheels that are a size larger and hard. In one word: Awesome!!! “Comfortable” enough, yet very hard — enough to take a heavy load. Bearings are less noisy then the original wheels as well. Solid 5 stars. Would have been 6 stars if these would have a grease nipple :)
customer_reviews.author: klompenrunner

customer_reviews.title: No more flat tires!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 6 cubic ft wheelbarrow that I use to haul wood and other heavy loads in. The 500# rating has been just right for my applications. I just wish I had bought one sooner! No more flat tires, yay!
customer_reviews.author: D. E. Mitts

customer_reviews.title: Solid wheel / perfect for real work
customer_reviews.text: I'm moving wheelbarrows full of clay and rock- 300-400#s. I wish I'd bought this sooner, rather than endlessly fixing the wheel that came with the Jackson wheelbarrow.
customer_reviews.author: michael98277

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This flat free wheelbarrow wheel is perfect. Haven't used my wheelbarrow for a couple years now because of a phnumatic tire that would not hold air. How frustrating.. Now fixed for 10 years or more I hope. Was crazy easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: cliff Leidecker

customer_reviews.title: Very good tire
customer_reviews.text: Looking good. I hope it last longer. Easy to assemble and operate very good
customer_reviews.author: Seth Ramesh

customer_reviews.title: Put this on my Wheelbarrow in cactus country.
customer_reviews.text: Its a game changer and can haul some heavy stuff, rocks and bricks. No flats or flat spots. I haven't had any problems. I wouldn't store a heavy load on it in order to avoid warping. It might not be an issue but I like the wheel to much to take the risk. SOLID WHEEL. I would buy another if I needed one.
customer_reviews.author: David Justice

customer_reviews.title: No more flat tire
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike. Great product solid tires guarantee no more flat tires. Tire was a good fit for my wheelbarrow.
customer_reviews.author: Julian

customer_reviews.title: No Brainer!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome wheel/tire! Replaced tubed tire on my True Temper Total Control wheelbarrow. This taller-tubeless tire SHOULD have been OEM. I filled, over the sides, of my wheelbarrow with brick, and it pushes like a dream. This is a small investment that reaps tremendous benefits!
customer_reviews.author: Kris A Hancock

customer_reviews.title: As advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Need to order another one for the second wheelbarrow.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha H.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I ordered.  Great price.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I ordered. Great price. This was the best alternative to inflatable tire replacements. 500 pound capacity is great for my twin wheel barrow.
customer_reviews.author: ALBERT V.

customer_reviews.title: great wheel!
customer_reviews.text: nice wheel. fits my jackson 6 cu. ft. wheelbarrow nicely!
customer_reviews.author: black wolf

customer_reviews.title: Not 16 inches!
customer_reviews.text: Solid tire and wheel, 3 stars for product description. On my Stanley tape measure tire only measures 15 inches. Like my wife says every inch counts! The height of the tire matters to me for clearance on my beam cart. I've been a carpenter for 23 years and I have a pretty good idea on how to measure. Look at pic.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: wheelbarrow wheel and tire
customer_reviews.text: I have an Ace Hardware wheelbarrow and this tire and wheel was a direct fit for the 5/8" axle. It's rated for 500 lbs. and a little overkill for what I need but all I am giving up is a little cushion in the tire. If my hardware was not so rusty it would have been a 5 minute swap.
customer_reviews.author: pk

customer_reviews.title: Great tire and great price.
customer_reviews.text: My 13 inch tube tire tore and did not want to deal with air tires anymore. This is my first no flat wheel barrel tire and love it. It replaced my 13 inch perfect and no need for spacers. I have an older ace hardware 5 cubic and working great! The price was excellent for this type of tire!
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Very easy to install, larger than the factory wheel, so more stable on sand and un-even ground. I'm getting sick of replacing rotten tubes. I think I'm on my forth one. I hope this run-flat wheel will have many years of service life on it before needing replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Hard ride but seems sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The tire was as advertised. I’m ooking forward to no more hassles with flat tires. One tradeoff I’ve noticed is that the tire gives a harder ride than the more bouncy inflated tire and it cuts deeper into gravel and soft ground. This tire is advertised for 500 pound capacity, not that I can handle that weight, and other tires were only 300 pounds and more expensive. One I saw had separated from the hub under load and I didn’t want to risk that. I think I can happily live with this compromise. Installation on my wheelbarrow (6” axle free space, 5/8” diameter) was a snap.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Wesson

customer_reviews.title: Solid, easy to install, exactly what was needed to get wheelbarrow higher off the ground
customer_reviews.text: For some reason the "standard" wheelbarrow wheels are too low to the ground which is a huge issue when trying to push the barrow. This one is just right. Also of course it is solid so it won't deflate. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Roden

customer_reviews.title: Excellent replacement wheel
customer_reviews.text: I like that it doesn't require any air and that it bolted right onto my wheelbarrow. Works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: SouthBarr

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy Good looking strong well made wheel U won’t be disappointed....
customer_reviews.text: Very Sturdy Good looking strong well made wheel U won’t be disappointed....
customer_reviews.author: Tex4me

customer_reviews.title: Great 👌 product recommend
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble product, and very thick durable tire definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Saylor

product_meta.title: Rocky Mountain Goods Flat Free Wheelbarrow Wheel 16" - 500 lbs. load rating - For 6 & 8 cubic ft. wheelbarrows including Jackson, True Temper, Ames, Ace - 5/8" axle
product_meta.description: Rocky Mountain Goods Flat Free Wheelbarrow Wheel 16” is the perfect flat free wheelbarrow tire for replacing on your Jackson, True Temper, Ames or Ace wheelbarrow. Made of polyurethane foam this wheel cannot be popped or flattened and can carry loads up to 500 pounds. Rocky Mountain Goods Flat Free Wheelbarrow Wheel 16” comes with a lifetime warranty.
feature_bullets: Flat Free Replacement wheelbarrow tire for Jackson, True Temper, Ace, Ames
16" Wheel size with 5/8” Pneumatic Ball Bearing
Made of heavy duty pop proof and flat proof polyurethane foam

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.9 out of 5 stars35 ratings4.9 out of 5 stars
